Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to veterans' credits for civil service appointments and promotions
Summary: Relates to veterans' credits for civil service appointments and promotions; removes the time of war requirement for veterans to qualify for additional credit.
LawCode: Amd ยง85, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to veterans' credits for civil service appointments and promotions
